subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: P.G.A. Championship officials have said that, as in 2010, when Dustin Johnson was assessed a controversial penalty, the roughly 1,000 sand patches strewn about the property are again bunkers.
snippet: P.G.A. Championship officials have said that, as in 2010, when Dustin Johnson was assessed a controversial penalty, the roughly 1,000 sand patches strewn about the property are again bunkers.
